name: Lordle
description:
Lordle is a Wordle-inspired game featuring cards from Legends of Runeterra. Also inspired by Cardle, a similar game for Hearthstone. Data might be out of date as patches are released, so please let me know if that's the case.

Notes: 

All multiregion cards are listed under Bandle City.

Celestial cards are included, in a rarity below Common.

Some cards have the exact same stats. If this happens, good luck.
